column3: Latest;Kep------:------ Provincial police arrested 2 suspects suspected of being involved with the distribution of illegal narcotics on the evening of December 5 2018. 7 packs of methamphetamine were seized.------Heng Chanshao
column5: 18 have been charged with drug trafficking.------After the arrest
column6: cops proceeded with a search of the suspect’s houses
column8: 2 guns and drugs paraphernalia discovered. ------After the arrest
column9: the suspects were brought  to the provincial police station to be prepared for the Kampot Provincial Court.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/137094
